Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: FinSnap - AI-Powered Expense Tracker

Features:
- React 19 + TypeScript frontend with mobile-optimized UI
- Supabase backend with PostgreSQL and Row Level Security
- Google Gemini AI for intelligent transaction parsing from SMS and images
- Capacitor for Android APK deployment
- Multi-device sync with cloud backup
- Secure API key management (server-side only)
- Multi-currency support with automatic exchange rates
- Smart categorization with recurring merchant rules
- Comprehensive transaction history and analytics

Architecture:
- Frontend: React 19, Tailwind CSS, Capacitor (Android)
- Backend: Supabase (PostgreSQL, Auth, Edge Functions)
- AI: Google Gemini 2.5 Flash API

Documentation:
- README.md: Full feature overview and getting started guide
- CLAUDE.md: Architecture and development guide for future Claude Code instances
- docs/SETUP_GUIDE.md: Step-by-step setup instructions
- docs/DATABASE_SCHEMA.md: Complete database schema reference

The app is fully functional and ready for personal use with Supabase cloud backend.
